I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat ->
Notation max := Init.Nat.max
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fold_left_maximum_le' : forall (l : list nat) (x y : nat), x <= y -> x <= fold_left Init.Nat.max l y
fold_left_maximum_le : forall (l : list nat) (x : nat), x <= fold_left Init.Nat.max l x
fold_symmetric : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> A -> A), (forall x y z : A, f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z) -> forall a0 : A, (forall y : A, f a0 y = f y a0) -> forall l : list A, fold_left f l a0 = fold_right f a0 l
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
fold_left_rev_right : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (rev l) = fold_left (fun (x : B) (y : A) => f y x) l i
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, (z > 0)%Z -> (t > 0)%Z -> (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x * z + y * t)%Z
OMEGA2 : forall x y : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x + y)%Z
fold_left_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), fold_left (fun (x : nat) (_ : A) => S x) l 0 = length l
Z.gt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.gt (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.compare = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => match y with | 0%Z => Eq | Z.pos _ => Lt | Z.neg _ => Gt end | Z.pos x' => match y with | Z.pos y' => (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Gt end | Z.neg x' => match y with | Z.neg y' => CompOpp (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Lt end end : Z -> Z -> comparison Arguments BinIntDef.Z.compare (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
fast_Zred_factor5 : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P y -> P (x * 0 + y)%Z
intro_Z : forall n : nat, exists y : Z, Z.of_nat n = y /\ (0 <= y * 1 + 0)%Z
In_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (a x : A) (xs : list A), In a (x :: xs) -> a <> x -> In a xs
fast_Zplus_comm : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (y + x)%Z -> P (x + y)%Z

ZMicromega.xhyps_of_pt = fix xhyps_of_pt (base : nat) (acc : list nat) (pt : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) {struct pt} : list nat := match pt with | ZMicromega.DoneProof => acc | ZMicromega.RatProof c pt0 | ZMicromega.CutProof c pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S base) (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c) pt0 | ZMicromega.EnumProof c1 c2 l => let acc0 := RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c2) c1 in fold_left (xhyps_of_pt (S base)) l acc0 | ZMicromega.ExProof _ pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S (S (S base))) acc pt0 end : nat ->...

fast_OMEGA13 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.pos x + l1 + (v * Z.neg x + l2))%Z
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
fold_right_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l l' : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (l ++ l') = fold_right f (fold_right f i l') l
Init.Nat.max = fix max (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n' => match m with | 0 => n | S m' => S (max n' m') end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.max (_ _)%nat_scope
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.opp _%Z_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
